name: Phenylephrine Hydrochloride
indications: phenylephrine hydrochloride injection indicated treatment clinically important hypotension resulting primarily vasodilation setting anesthesia .
contraindications: phenylephrine hydrochloride injection 500 mcg/5 ml ( 100 mcg/ml ) must diluted intravenous bolus . supplied ready-to-use formulation . dosing treatment hypotension anesthesia bolus intravenous injection : initial dose 40 mcg 100 mcg . additional boluses 200 mcg may administered every 1 2 minutes needed . adjust dose according pressor response ( i.e . , titrate effect ) .
warningsAndPrecautions: phenylephrine hydrochloride injection usp , 500 mcg/5 ml ( 100 mcg/ml ) intravenous , clear colorless solution , essentially free visible extraneous matter available clear glass ampule white snap blue band supplied follows : ndc . strength supplied ndc 70069-591-10 pack 10 ' 5 ml single-dose ampules ' 500 mcg/5 ml ( 100 mcg/ml ) 10 ampules per carton store phenylephrine hydrochloride injection usp , 500 mcg/5 ml ( 100 mcg/ml ) , 20°c 25°c ( 68°f 77°f ) , excursions permitted 15°c 30°c ( 59°f 86°f ) [ usp controlled room temperature ] . protect light . discard unused portion .
indications_original: Phenylephrine hydrochloride injection is indicated for the treatment of clinically important hypotension resulting primarily from vasodilation in the setting of anesthesia.
contraindications_original: Phenylephrine hydrochloride injection 500 mcg/5 mL (100 mcg/mL) MUST NOT BE DILUTED before administration as an intravenous bolus. It is supplied as a READY-TO-USE formulation. Dosing for treatment of hypotension during anesthesia Bolus intravenous injection: Initial dose is 40 mcg to 100 mcg. Additional boluses up to 200 mcg may be administered every 1 to 2 minutes as needed. Adjust the dose according to the pressor response (i.e., titrate to effect).
warningsAndPrecautions_original:
Phenylephrine hydrochloride injection USP, 500 mcg/5 mL (100 mcg/mL) for intravenous use, is a clear colorless solution, essentially free from visible extraneous matter available in a clear glass ampule with white snap off and blue band and is supplied as follows: 
                  
                     
                     
                     
                     
                     
                        
                           
                               NDC No.
                              
                           
                           
                               Strength
                              
                           
                           
                               How Supplied
                              
                           
                        
                        
                            NDC 70069-591-10 Pack of 10 '5 mL Single-Dose ampules'
                           
                            500 mcg/5 mL (100 mcg/mL)
                           
                            10 ampules per carton
                           
                        
                     
                  
                  Store phenylephrine hydrochloride injection USP, 500 mcg/5 mL (100 mcg/mL), at 20°C to 25°C (68°F to 77°F), excursions permitted to 15°C to 30°C (59°F to 86°F) [see USP Controlled Room Temperature]. 
                  Protect from light.
                  Discard any unused portion.
